00056 static int rna_CurveMapping_curves_length(PointerRNA *ptr)
00057 {
00058     CurveMapping *cumap = (CurveMapping*)ptr->data;
00059     int len;
00060 
00061     for (len = 0; len<CM_TOT; len++)
00062         if (!cumap->cm[len].curve)
00063             break;
00064     
00065     return len;
00066 }
00067 
00068 static void rna_CurveMapping_curves_begin(CollectionPropertyIterator *iter, PointerRNA *ptr)
00069 {
00070     CurveMapping *cumap = (CurveMapping*)ptr->data;
00071 
00072     rna_iterator_array_begin(iter, cumap->cm, sizeof(CurveMap), rna_CurveMapping_curves_length(ptr), 0, NULL);
00073 }
00074 
00075 static void rna_CurveMapping_clip_set(PointerRNA *ptr, int value)
00076 {
00077     CurveMapping *cumap = (CurveMapping*)ptr->data;
00078 
00079     if (value) cumap->flag |= CUMA_DO_CLIP;
00080     else cumap->flag &= ~CUMA_DO_CLIP;
00081 
00082     curvemapping_changed(cumap, 0);
00083 }

00085 static void rna_CurveMapping_black_level_set(PointerRNA *ptr, const float *values)
00086 {
00087     CurveMapping *cumap = (CurveMapping*)ptr->data;
00088     cumap->black[0] = values[0];
00089     cumap->black[1] = values[1];
00090     cumap->black[2] = values[2];
00091     curvemapping_set_black_white(cumap, NULL, NULL);
00092 }

00136 static char *rna_ColorRamp_path(PointerRNA *ptr)
00137 {
00138     /* handle the cases where a single datablock may have 2 ramp types */
00139     if (ptr->id.data) {
00140         ID *id = ptr->id.data;
00141         
00142         switch (GS(id->name)) {
00143             case ID_MA: /* material has 2 cases - diffuse and specular */
00144             {
00145                 Material *ma = (Material*)id;
00146                 
00147                 if (ptr->data == ma->ramp_col)
00148                     return BLI_strdup("diffuse_ramp");
00149                 else if (ptr->data == ma->ramp_spec)
00150                     return BLI_strdup("specular_ramp");
00151             }
00152                 break;
00153         }
00154     }
00155     
00156     /* everything else just uses 'color_ramp' */
00157     return BLI_strdup("color_ramp");
00158 }
00159 
00160 static char *rna_ColorRampElement_path(PointerRNA *ptr)
00161 {
00162     PointerRNA ramp_ptr;
00163     PropertyRNA *prop;
00164     char *path = NULL;
00165     int index;
00166     
00167     /* helper macro for use here to try and get the path
00168      *  - this calls the standard code for getting a path to a texture...
00169      */
00170 
00171 #define COLRAMP_GETPATH                                                       \
00172 {                                                                             \
00173     prop = RNA_struct_find_property(&ramp_ptr, "elements");                   \
00174     if (prop) {                                                               \
00175         index = RNA_property_collection_lookup_index(&ramp_ptr, prop, ptr);   \
00176         if (index >= 0) {                                                     \
00177             char *texture_path = rna_ColorRamp_path(&ramp_ptr);               \
00178             path = BLI_sprintfN("%s.elements[%d]", texture_path, index);      \
00179             MEM_freeN(texture_path);                                          \
00180         }                                                                     \
00181     }                                                                         \
00182 }
00183 
00184     /* determine the path from the ID-block to the ramp */
00185     /* FIXME: this is a very slow way to do it, but it will have to suffice... */
00186     if (ptr->id.data) {
00187         ID *id = ptr->id.data;
00188         
00189         switch (GS(id->name)) {
00190             case ID_MA: /* 2 cases for material - diffuse and spec */
00191             {
00192                 Material *ma = (Material *)id;
00193                 
00194                 /* try diffuse first */
00195                 if (ma->ramp_col) {
00196                     RNA_pointer_create(id, &RNA_ColorRamp, ma->ramp_col, &ramp_ptr);
00197                     COLRAMP_GETPATH;
00198                 }
00199                 /* try specular if not diffuse */
00200                 if (!path && ma->ramp_spec) {
00201                     RNA_pointer_create(id, &RNA_ColorRamp, ma->ramp_spec, &ramp_ptr);
00202                     COLRAMP_GETPATH;
00203                 }
00204             }
00205                 break;
00206                 
00207                 /* TODO: node trees need special attention */
00208             case ID_NT:
00209             {
00210                 bNodeTree *ntree = (bNodeTree *)id;
00211                 bNode *node;
00212                 
00213                 for (node = ntree->nodes.first; node; node = node->next) {
00214                     if (ELEM3(node->type, SH_NODE_VALTORGB, CMP_NODE_VALTORGB, TEX_NODE_VALTORGB)) {
00215                         RNA_pointer_create(id, &RNA_ColorRamp, node->storage, &ramp_ptr);
00216                         COLRAMP_GETPATH;
00217                     }
00218                 }
00219             }
00220                 break;
00221                 
00222             default: /* everything else should have a "color_ramp" property */
00223             {
00224                 /* create pointer to the ID block, and try to resolve "color_ramp" pointer */
00225                 RNA_id_pointer_create(id, &ramp_ptr);
00226                 if (RNA_path_resolve(&ramp_ptr, "color_ramp", &ramp_ptr, &prop)) {
00227                     COLRAMP_GETPATH;
00228                 }
00229             }
00230         }
00231     }
00232     
00233     /* cleanup the macro we defined */
00234 #undef COLRAMP_GETPATH
00235     
00236     return path;
00237 }
00238 
00239 static void rna_ColorRamp_update(Main *bmain, Scene *UNUSED(scene), PointerRNA *ptr)
00240 {
00241     if (ptr->id.data) {
00242         ID *id = ptr->id.data;
00243         
00244         switch (GS(id->name)) {
00245             case ID_MA:
00246             {
00247                 Material *ma = ptr->id.data;
00248                 
00249                 DAG_id_tag_update(&ma->id, 0);
00250                 WM_main_add_notifier(NC_MATERIAL|ND_SHADING_DRAW, ma);
00251             }
00252                 break;
00253             case ID_NT:
00254             {
00255                 bNodeTree *ntree = (bNodeTree *)id;
00256                 bNode *node;
00257 
00258                 for (node = ntree->nodes.first; node; node = node->next) {
00259                     if (ELEM3(node->type, SH_NODE_VALTORGB, CMP_NODE_VALTORGB, TEX_NODE_VALTORGB)) {
00260                         ED_node_generic_update(bmain, ntree, node);
00261                     }
00262                 }
00263             }
00264                 break;
00265             case ID_TE:
00266             {
00267                 Tex *tex = ptr->id.data;
00268 
00269                 DAG_id_tag_update(&tex->id, 0);
00270                 WM_main_add_notifier(NC_TEXTURE, tex);
00271             }
00272                 break;
00273             default:
00274                 break;
00275         }
00276     }
00277 }

00279 void rna_ColorRamp_eval(struct ColorBand *coba, float position, float color[4])
00280 {
00281     do_colorband(coba, position, color);
00282 }

00284 static CBData *rna_ColorRampElement_new(struct ColorBand *coba, ReportList *reports, float position)
00285 {
00286     CBData *element = colorband_element_add(coba, position);
00287 
00288     if (element == NULL)
00289         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Unable to add element to colorband (limit %d)", MAXCOLORBAND);
00290 
00291     return element;
00292 }
00293 
00294 static void rna_ColorRampElement_remove(struct ColorBand *coba, ReportList *reports, CBData *element)
00295 {
00296     int index = (int)(element - coba->data);
00297     if (colorband_element_remove(coba, index) == 0)
00298         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Element not found in element collection or last element");
00299 
00300 }

00302 static void rna_Scopes_update(Main *UNUSED(bmain), Scene *UNUSED(scene), PointerRNA *ptr)
00303 {
00304     Scopes *s = (Scopes*)ptr->data;
00305     s->ok = 0;
00306 }

00310 static void rna_def_curvemappoint(BlenderRNA *brna)
00311 {
00312     StructRNA *srna;
00313     PropertyRNA *prop;
00314     static EnumPropertyItem prop_handle_type_items[] = {
00315         {0, "AUTO", 0, "Auto Handle", ""},
00316         {CUMA_VECTOR, "VECTOR", 0, "Vector Handle", ""},
00317         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
00318     };
00319 
00320     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "CurveMapPoint", NULL);
00321     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "CurveMapPoint", "Point of a curve used for a curve mapping");
00322 
00323     /* not editable for now, need to have CurveMapping to do curvemapping_changed */
00324 
00325     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "location", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_XYZ);
00326     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "x");
00327     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 2);
00328     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
00329     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Location", "X/Y coordinates of the curve point");
00330 
00331     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "handle_type", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00332     RNA_def_property_enum_bitflag_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag");
00333     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, prop_handle_type_items);
00334     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
00335     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Handle Type", "Curve interpolation at this point: Bezier or vector");
00336 
00337     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "select", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00338     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", CUMA_SELECT);
00339     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Select", "Selection state of the curve point");
00340 }

00414

00418     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Black Level", "For RGB curves, the color that black is mapped to");

00420

00451 static void rna_def_color_ramp_element_api(BlenderRNA *brna, PropertyRNA *cprop)
00452 {
00453     StructRNA *srna;
00454     PropertyRNA *parm;
00455     FunctionRNA *func;
00456 
00457     RNA_def_property_srna(cprop, "ColorRampElements");
00458     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "ColorRampElements", NULL);
00459     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "ColorBand");
00460     RNA_def_struct_path_func(srna, "rna_ColorRampElement_path");
00461     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Color Ramp Elements", "Collection of Color Ramp Elements");
00462 
00463     /* TODO, make these functions generic in texture.c */
00464     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "new", "rna_ColorRampElement_new");
00465     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Add element to ColorRamp");
00466     RNA_def_function_flag(func, FUNC_USE_REPORTS);
00467     parm = RNA_def_float(func, "position", 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f, "Position", "Position to add element", 0.0f, 1.0f);
00468     RNA_def_property_flag(parm, PROP_REQUIRED);
00469     /* return type */
00470     parm = RNA_def_pointer(func, "element", "ColorRampElement", "", "New element");
00471     RNA_def_function_return(func, parm);
00472 
00473     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "remove", "rna_ColorRampElement_remove");
00474     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Delete element from ColorRamp");
00475     RNA_def_function_flag(func, FUNC_USE_REPORTS);
00476     parm = RNA_def_pointer(func, "element", "ColorRampElement", "", "Element to remove");
00477     RNA_def_property_flag(parm, PROP_REQUIRED|PROP_NEVER_NULL);
00478 }
00479 
00480 static void rna_def_color_ramp(BlenderRNA *brna)
00481 {
00482     StructRNA *srna;
00483     PropertyRNA *prop;
00484     FunctionRNA *func;
00485 
00486     static EnumPropertyItem prop_interpolation_items[] = {
00487         {1, "EASE", 0, "Ease", ""},
00488         {3, "CARDINAL", 0, "Cardinal", ""},
00489         {0, "LINEAR", 0, "Linear", ""},
00490         {2, "B_SPLINE", 0, "B-Spline", ""},
00491         {4, "CONSTANT", 0, "Constant", ""},
00492         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00493     
00494     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "ColorRamp", NULL);
00495     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "ColorBand");
00496     RNA_def_struct_path_func(srna, "rna_ColorRamp_path");
00497     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Color Ramp", "Color ramp mapping a scalar value to a color");
00498     
00499     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "elements", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_COLOR);
00500     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "data", "tot");
00501     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "ColorRampElement");
00502     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Elements", "");
00503     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_ColorRamp_update");
00504     rna_def_color_ramp_element_api(brna, prop);
00505 
00506     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "interpolation", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00507     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "ipotype");
00508     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, prop_interpolation_items);
00509     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Interpolation", "");
00510     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_ColorRamp_update");
00511 
00512 #if 0 /* use len(elements) */
00513     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "total", PROP_INT, PROP_NONE);
00514     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "tot");
00515     /* needs a function to do the right thing when adding elements like colorband_add_cb() */
00516     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
00517     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, 31); /* MAXCOLORBAND = 32 */
00518     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Total", "Total number of elements");
00519     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_ColorRamp_update");
00520 #endif
00521     
00522     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "evaluate", "rna_ColorRamp_eval");
00523     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Evaluate ColorRamp");
00524     prop = RNA_def_float(func, "position", 1.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f, "Position", "Evaluate ColorRamp at position", 0.0f, 1.0f);
00525     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_REQUIRED);
00526     /* return */
00527     prop = RNA_def_float_color(func, "color", 4, NULL, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, "Color", "Color at given position",
00528                                -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX);
00529     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_THICK_WRAP);
00530     RNA_def_function_output(func, prop);
00531 }
00532 
00533 static void rna_def_histogram(BlenderRNA *brna)
00534 {
00535     StructRNA *srna;
00536     PropertyRNA *prop;
00537     
00538     static EnumPropertyItem prop_mode_items[] = {
00539         {HISTO_MODE_LUMA, "LUMA", ICON_COLOR, "Luma", ""},
00540         {HISTO_MODE_RGB, "RGB", ICON_COLOR, "Red Green Blue", ""},
00541         {HISTO_MODE_R, "R", ICON_COLOR, "Red", ""},
00542         {HISTO_MODE_G, "G", ICON_COLOR, "Green", ""},
00543         {HISTO_MODE_B, "B", ICON_COLOR, "Blue", ""},
00544         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00545         
00546     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "Histogram", NULL);
00547     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Histogram", "Statistical view of the levels of color in an image");
00548     
00549     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "mode", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00550     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "mode");
00551     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, prop_mode_items);
00552     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Mode", "Channels to display when drawing the histogram");
00553     
00554 }
00555 
00556 static void rna_def_scopes(BlenderRNA *brna)
00557 {
00558     StructRNA *srna;
00559     PropertyRNA *prop;
00560 
00561     static EnumPropertyItem prop_wavefrm_mode_items[] = {
00562         {SCOPES_WAVEFRM_LUMA, "LUMA", ICON_COLOR, "Luma", ""},
00563         {SCOPES_WAVEFRM_RGB, "RGB", ICON_COLOR, "Red Green Blue", ""},
00564         {SCOPES_WAVEFRM_YCC_601, "YCBCR601", ICON_COLOR, "YCbCr (ITU 601)", ""},
00565         {SCOPES_WAVEFRM_YCC_709, "YCBCR709", ICON_COLOR, "YCbCr (ITU 709)", ""},
00566         {SCOPES_WAVEFRM_YCC_JPEG, "YCBCRJPG", ICON_COLOR, "YCbCr (Jpeg)", ""},
00567         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00568 
00569     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "Scopes", NULL);
00570     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Scopes", "Scopes for statistical view of an image");
00571     
00572     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_full_resolution", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00573     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, "Scopes", "sample_full", 1);
00574     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Full Sample", "Sample every pixel of the image");
00575     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Scopes_update");
00576     
00577     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "accuracy", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_PERCENTAGE);
00578     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, "Scopes", "accuracy");
00579     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0, 100.0);
00580     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0.0, 100.0, 10, 1);
00581     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Accuracy", "Proportion of original image source pixel lines to sample");
00582     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Scopes_update");
00583 
00584     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "histogram", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
00585     RNA_def_property_pointer_sdna(prop, "Scopes", "hist");
00586     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "Histogram");
00587     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Histogram", "Histogram for viewing image statistics");
00588 
00589     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "waveform_mode", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00590     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, "Scopes", "wavefrm_mode");
00591     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, prop_wavefrm_mode_items);
00592     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Waveform Mode", "");
00593     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Scopes_update");
00594 
00595     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "waveform_alpha", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_FACTOR);
00596     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, "Scopes", "wavefrm_alpha");
00597     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, 1);
00598     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Waveform Opacity", "Opacity of the points");
00599 
00600     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "vectorscope_alpha", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_FACTOR);
00601     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, "Scopes", "vecscope_alpha");
00602     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, 1);
00603     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Vectorscope Opacity", "Opacity of the points");
00604 }

00607 void RNA_def_color(BlenderRNA *brna)
00608 {
00609     rna_def_curvemappoint(brna);
00610     rna_def_curvemap(brna);
00611     rna_def_curvemapping(brna);
00612     rna_def_color_ramp_element(brna);
00613     rna_def_color_ramp(brna);
00614     rna_def_histogram(brna);
00615     rna_def_scopes(brna);
00616 }
